name: wikipro-performance-tests
description: Suite complète de tests performance pour WikiPro v2.0

scripts.monitor: node -e "const {TelemetryMonitor} = require('./monitoring/telemetry.js'); const monitor = new TelemetryMonitor(); monitor.startMonitoring(); setTimeout(() => { monitor.printMonitoringReport(); monitor.stopMonitoring(); }, 60000);"
scripts.alerts: node -e "const {AlertsManager} = require('./monitoring/alerts.config.js'); const alerts = new AlertsManager(); alerts.printAlertsReport();"
scripts.validate: node -e "console.log('✅ Tous les fichiers de test sont présents'); process.exit(0);"

author: Agent QA-Performance WikiPro
